title: Neon Beats
description:
Neon Beats is a 2D side view platformer game in which the player will evolve in different levels that are rhythmed by catchy musics. Coffee Shop Tycoon
Complete levels as quickly as possible Gather several hidden collectibles Brave different challenging obstacles
In Neon Beats, you will find :

system_requirements.Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.5+ GHz Dual Core or better)
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1gb) or AMD Radeon HD6670 (1gb) or equivalent
